ComicInfo.Summary:
After botching the Montreal job and making a new enemy out of DEATH GRIP, Deadpool had the great idea to start his own boutique mercenary agency (definitely his idea! Not at all Agent Gao's!) But a startup is a lot of work, so Wade asks TASKMASTER to run it!
Their first assignment?
Finding out who this Death Grip is and why he's so interested in Wade.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:01:41. [CVDB1054375]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Declan Shalvey, Iban Coello, Javier Garrón, Jay David Ramos, Juan Manuel Rodriguez, Mark Brooks, Rob Liefeld, Sean Galloway, Taurin Clarke
ComicInfo.Characters: Crossbones, Deadpool, Doug Siravanta, Ellie Camacho, Emily Preston, Jeff Preston, Renesmee, Shane Preston, Taskmaster
ComicInfo.Locations: Balkan Mountains, Europe, Flagstaff, Arizona, Symkaria
